name: Mushroom and Barley Ragout
description: This healthy and simple side dish can be prepared ahead of time. It's a perfect standby to re-heat throughout the week and pair with your choice of meat or other protein.
keywords: barley, mushroom, parsley, fall, side dish

recipeInstructions.text: Place the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat and saute the shiitake mushrooms for 10 minutes. Add the white mushrooms, season with salt and pepper, reduce heat, cover and cook for 5 minutes. Add the barley and water and cook, covered, over medium heat for 30 minutes until the barley is tender. Remove from heat. Stir in the parsley.
